channel.title: Wario Land 4 on Jefklak's Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Wario Land 4 on Jefklak's Codex

item.title: Wario Land: a retrospective
item.description: It’s been over 20 years since I last touched any of the Wario Land games. I vaguely remember them being one of the most exciting platformers I’ve ever played as a kid. However, thanks to my manic tidying itches, I sold most if not all Gameboy games I’ve ever owned. Thanks to a recent resurgence in retro game interest, I came across a Wario game for the Gameboy. The shopkeeper sold them all 4 and raised his brow when I wanted to pay.
